Package kin.sdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Balance  
    EventListener<T>  
    KinAccount
    Represents an account which holds Kin.
    PaymentInfo
    Represents payment issued on the blockchain.
    TransactionId
    Identifier of the transaction, useful for finding information about the transaction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Environment
    Provides blockchain network details
    KinClient
    An account manager for a KinAccount.
    ListenerRegistration
    Represents a listener to BlockchainEvents, that can be removed using ListenerRegistration.remove().
    Transaction  
    WhitelistableTransaction
    This class wraps a transaction envelope xdr in base 64(transaction payload) and a network passphrase(the network id as string).
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AccountStatus
